android_install_step_one:
Vula isiphequluli somakhalekhukhwini wakho

Ngena ku 

bit.ly/concompass

Cofa ibhena ethi- "Faka i-Constitution Compass kwisikrini sakho sasekhaya" 
ulalendele imiyalelo.
android_install_step_two:
Uma ibhena ingaveli, cofa uphawu lwe-Toolbar 
ekhoneni langesokudla phezulu. bese ucofa- "Faka i-App".
android_install_step_three: Uma ufuna ukuvula i-app, yithole kwisikrini sakho sasekhaya
cases_feature_text: Shesha uphequlule inguqulo ebuyekeziwe futhi yahlanganiswa yeMithetho yesiGungu sikaZwelonke sePhalamende.
guides_feature_text: Quick guides to the purpose and meaning of each section of the Bill of Rights and some of the most used chapters of the Constitution.
how_to_install_app_on_phone: How to install the app on your phone
if_no_safari_instruction:
• Open your Safari browser
    Note: It must be Safari, you cannot use Google Chrome or Firefox.
  • Go to  bit.ly/concompass
install_on_ios_heading: Install on your iPhone or iPad
ios_install_text:
• Scroll down and tap “Add to Home Screen” then tap “Add”
  • To open the app, find it on your home screen
main_content:
Constitution Compass

The Constitution App for Members of Parliament.

Browse, search and understand the South African Constitution and how it applies to everyone. Continuously updated and curated Constitution and  Rules of the National Assembly .
rules_feature_text: Accessible guides to the South African Constitutional Court’s authoritative interpretation of the Constitution.
search_feature_text: Search across the Constitution, Rules, Guides or Cases to find the information that you need.
search_feature_title: Find what you are looking for
tap_share_icon_text: Tap the share icon at the bottom of the screen
